reviewText: I remember seeing these movies as a kid and had to have them! These are great to have to add to your 80's collection :)
Title: Totally Awesome 80s Double Feature: (Losin' It / The Last American Virgin)

reviewText: Saw Losin' It & The Last American Virgin when first released on Video and now again on DVD a 80's double feature with a good picture & sound , Losin' It 1983 Starring Tom Cruise who has everything to gain & certain something to lose when he crosses paths with Shelley Long in a road trip comedy and The Last American Virgin 1982 a boxoffice comedy about three sex-starved high school buddies with only one thing left to lose a Totally Awsome 80's Double Feauture DVD Recommended .
summary: losin' It & The Last American Vigin .
Title: Totally Awesome 80s Double Feature: (Losin' It / The Last American Virgin)

reviewText: I have to admit that a lot of the movies from the 1980's go either way...either I love them or I'm angry I wasted a portion of my life. Both of these movies were fun, Losin' It with John Stockwell as the star and with Jackie Earle Haley and Tom Cruise as his followers was terrific the guys need to go to Mexico to "lose it". fun. By far though my favorite of the 2 is "the last American virgin", attractive cast, very well acted, funny when it needed to be and authentic when dealing with the problems of youth. Very highly recommended.
Title: Totally Awesome 80s Double Feature: (Losin' It / The Last American Virgin)

reviewText: My buddies and I watched these two movies many times back in the eighties and really enjoyed them. I just got a chance to relive a bit of my teenage years as I watched these two movies again. They really took me back.
Title: Totally Awesome 80s Double Feature: (Losin' It / The Last American Virgin)

reviewText: ......AS Good as the movie.."Last American Virgin" is a true Rare 80s classic where the story,characters (ALL Actors in this film are great)and SOUNDTRACK are A+..Steve Antin (Brother of pussycat dolls founder)played Kevin and was a true player....Porkys was riding high at this time and "Last American Virgin" didn't get as much political movie industry power behind it like Porkys did but this movie was so much better (in my opinion)..One of the MANY funniest scenes in the movie was the Character "GARY" and the drug store Pharmacist...lol"The Last American Virgin" & "Risky Business" are KINGS of 80s fun goodtime movies....What happened to the great 80s movie writers???Especially Boaz Davison!!!!!Again,,,Great Soundtrack!!!!!
summary: The Soundtrack to "Last American Virgin",Alone IS.......................
Title: Totally Awesome 80s Double Feature: (Losin' It / The Last American Virgin)
